aya mihiri lesa nila wikramasinhage ‘dawasak da ra wasantha sanakeliye’ githaya hari apuruwata gayana kala.ewitama ape pataka pirisath ekwa aya wenuwen parani chithrapata githa kihipayak gayana kale sawoma sathutu karamin.oya rangapamata issarawela monawada kala kala katayuthu?nawathath buddhika wimasuwa.swarnawahiniye ‘mahajana sewaya pinisayi’ wadasatahana idiripath kala.‘rantharu’ teli natyaye thema githaye mul kotasa mokakda?ranjani nawathath wimasuwa.rantharu dile sisara....neda?ehenam eekata me kallath ekathukara ganna ma gane.mokakda ee kalla?‘rantharu dile sisara - tharu mihire gile ishara’ kiyala.
